scripts.build:libs: npm run build:claro:core && npm run build:claro:commons && npm run build:crm:commons && npm run build:crm:styles
scripts.build:login: ng build login --prod --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --single-bundle true && cp dist/login/main.js projects/shell/src/assets/microapps/crm-login.bundle.js
scripts.build:dashboard: ng build dashboard --prod --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --single-bundle true && cp dist/dashboard/main.js projects/shell/src/assets/microapps/crm-dashboard.bundle.js
scripts.build:customers: ng build customers --prod --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --single-bundle true && cp dist/customers/main.js projects/shell/src/assets/microapps/crm-customers.bundle.js
scripts.build:contracts: ng build contracts --prod --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --single-bundle true && cp dist/contracts/main.js projects/shell/src/assets/microapps/crm-contracts.bundle.js
scripts.build:biometric: ng build biometric --prod --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --single-bundle true && cp dist/biometric/main.js projects/shell/src/assets/microapps/crm-biometric.bundle.js
scripts.build:reports: ng build reports --prod --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --single-bundle true && cp dist/reports/main.js projects/shell/src/assets/microapps/crm-reports.bundle.js
scripts.build:sellers: ng build sellers --prod --extra-webpack-config webpack.externals.js --single-bundle true && cp dist/sellers/main.js projects/shell/src/assets/microapps/crm-sellers.bundle.js
scripts.build:apps: npm run build:login && npm run build:dashboard && npm run build:customers && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:biometric && npm run build:reports && npm run build:sellers
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:apps && npm run build
